name: Tethered (itch) (ginga_cha)
description:
Hello!

This year's Brackey's game jam is my first Game Jam.

This is a two-player concept game where you must try to stay "tethered" as much as possible.

In order to pass the level, you must eliminate all of the enemies.

Credits:

Game by: ginga_cha
Character art by: lemochat
